name: Harrah's Lake Tahoe
description: Harrah's Lake Tahoe is a landmark Stateline casino resort with mountain-view rooms, gaming, dining, and live entertainment. Minutes from Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course.
shortDescription: Landmark Stateline casino minutes from Edgewood Tahoe with mountain views and live entertainment.

roomTypes.name: Mountain Tower Room
roomTypes.description: Newly renovated room in the Mountain Tower with contemporary decor, premium bedding, flat-screen TV, and mountain views.

roomTypes.name: Mountain Tower Premium Room
roomTypes.description: Upgraded room with enhanced furnishings, workspace, and panoramic views of the lake or mountains.

roomTypes.name: Suite
roomTypes.description: Spacious suite with separate living area, premium amenities, and spectacular Lake Tahoe or mountain views.

dining.name: Friday's Station Steak & Seafood
dining.description: Fine dining steaks with lake views.

faqs.question: Is Harrah's connected to Harvey's?
faqs.answer: Yes — Harrah's and Harvey's Lake Tahoe are connected via an enclosed skywalk, giving guests easy access to both properties' dining, entertainment, and casino floors.

faqs.question: Does Harrah's have a pool?
faqs.answer: Yes — an outdoor pool is available seasonally along with a full-service spa and fitness center.

faqs.question: How far is Harrah's from Heavenly ski resort?
faqs.answer: Heavenly Village and the gondola are within walking distance — about a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

meta.title: Harrah's Lake Tahoe | Casino Resort & Golf Packages
meta.description: Harrah's Lake Tahoe in Stateline. Minutes from Edgewood Tahoe with custom golf packages.

testimonials.quote: Third year in a row staying at Harrah's Lake Tahoe for our corporate golf outing. Consistency is what matters for group travel and this property delivers every time. Having GTHS handle reservations saves us hours of coordination.
testimonials.author: Robert L.

testimonials.quote: We've stayed at several Lake Tahoe properties for golf trips and Harrah's Lake Tahoe is now our go-to. Great amenities, solid dining options, and the rooms are comfortable after a long day on the course.
testimonials.author: Gary D.

testimonials.quote: Our conference group of 40 stayed at Harrah's Lake Tahoe. Meeting rooms were perfect, the rooms were comfortable, and being in Lake Tahoe meant we could add golf days to the agenda. GTHS made the whole package seamless.
testimonials.author: Patrick H.
